entries.title: Deepfakes for scrawl: With handwriting synthesis, no pen is necessary
entries.description: Free neural network demo generates dynamic, downloadable handwriting on the fly.

entries.title: Q4 2022 was a disaster for smartphone sales, sees the largest-ever drop
entries.description: Phone sales plummeted 18 percent last quarter, 11 percent for the entire year.

entries.title: Antibiotic resistance induced by the widespread use of… antidepressants?
entries.description: Bacteria evolve drug resistance more readily when antidepressants are around.

entries.title: Do mechanical keyboards really need arrow keys?
entries.description: Angry Miao replaces bulky arrow buttons with a 2×0.5-inch capacitive touchpad.

entries.title: MSG probed over use of facial recognition to eject lawyers from show venues
entries.description: MSG says policy is legal, while NY AG alleges it may violate civil rights law.

entries.title: Microsoft said to be working on an overhauled File Explorer for Windows 11
entries.description: Microsoft added tabs to Explorer recently, but this redesign goes further.

entries.title: Get your first look at the OnePlus Pad, OnePlus’ first tablet
entries.description: We've got both official and unofficial renders of the supposedly 11.6-inch tablet.

entries.title: Meta will allow Donald Trump back on Facebook, sparking wave of criticism
entries.description: Critics warn Meta: Trump will continue to "spread lies and... incite violence."

entries.title: Airlines and cattle ranchers have beef with Google’s climate math
entries.description: Businesses with sales at stake are pushing back on Google's emissions estimates.

entries.title: By learning to hunt otters, wolves decimate a deer population
entries.description: On an Alaskan island, wolves adapted to hunt an unexpected aquatic prey.

entries.title: RSA’s demise from quantum attacks is very much exaggerated, expert says
entries.description: Expert says the focus on quantum attacks may distract us from more immediate threats.
